imdb.title: Kanojo, Okarishimasu
imdb.plot: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a college student enlists a dating service to "rent" a girlfriend who, unbeknownst to him, happens to be both a fellow student and his neighbor.

episodes.title: Dream and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: After a short season ending, Chizuru Mizuhara gets an opportunity to demonstrate her acting skills to a well known famous director. Meanwhile Kazuya is attending the show secretly and experience something that he must do.

episodes.title: The Usual Girlfriend
episodes.plot: As the fallout from the play becomes clear, things go back to normal between Mizuhara and Kazuya, until...?

episodes.title: The Return of the Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Mizuhara has lost the key to her apartment and comes to Kazuya for some reason - and she's not the only unexpected visitor.

episodes.title: Night and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Ruka makes food for Kazuma at his house, but a typhoon hits and she has to stay the night.

episodes.title: Birthday and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya requested a rental date with Sumi so he can get some advice what birthday present he can get for Chizuru. As the one-day rental date went on with Sumi, she's realizing she's also crushing on Kazuya. What will Kazuya do?

episodes.title: Booze and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: As Kazuya wonders if his birthday gift was good enough, he and Chizuru find themselves in a crisis in the form of a boozer.

episodes.title: Ex and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: The next morning, a hungover Kazuya cannot remember what happened the previous night. He then heads to school where he hangs out with the group from the drinking party. When he returns home, he discovers Chizuru was indeed in his apartment. At work, Ruka is disappointed to learn that Chizuru does not believe she and Kazuya had sex. Just then, Mami shows up, revealing Kibe told her about Kazuya's job. Once Ruka figures out who Mami is, she calls her out and claims she is Kazuya's girlfriend now. When a stunned Mami later wonders about the situation concerning Kazuya ...

episodes.title: Youth and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya is eating dinner when he receives a call from Ruka, who apologizes for how she acted towards Mami. Elsewhere, Mami engages Kazuya's grandmother on Twitter. Back in Kazuya's apartment, he discovers Chizuru has been promoted. Sometime later, Kazuya and Chizuru have an outing at Tokyo Dome City where both are wearing high school uniforms. After a while, they avoid running into Sumi when they spot her at a clothing store. They then head to an arcade where they have their pictures taken inside a photo booth. However, Kazuya is unable to retrieve them due to Chizuru ...

episodes.title: Kiss and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Once Kazuya's grandmother learns Chizuru's birthday has already passed, she decides to turn Kazuya's birthday party into a combined party. When Kazuya invites Chizuru over to his family's house, she informs him that she will arrive there after she visits her grandmother at the hospital. The next day, Kazuya is approached by Ruka when he heads to the party after he inadvertently revealed he was going there with Chizuru. After they show up at his family's house, Ruka uses the opportunity to create a favorable impression. Meanwhile, Chizuru is at the hospital with her ...

episodes.title: Ring and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya can barely process Ruka's actions when Nagomi decides to drop another bomb on the party.

episodes.title: Guide and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: While on their balconies, Chizuru informs Kazuya that Sumi wants to see him. A few days later, he meets up with Sumi where he notices she is wearing a high school uniform, revealing she saw him and Chizuru at Tokyo Dome City. Then they head to a marine mammal park. There, Sumi acts as Kazuya's guide. After a while, she takes him to a dolphin show. That night, they head to a popular romantic spot where Kazuya becomes flustered until Sumi hands him a birthday present. When she wonders what is wrong, he reveals the situation concerning Chizuru, which causes them to be ...

episodes.title: Girlfriend and Me
episodes.plot: Chizuru reflects on her journey to get her here, and Kazuya acts on his idea to help her.

episodes.title: Rent-a-Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya is dumped by his girlfriend after a month of dating her. Desperate to find another, Kazuya rents a beautiful girl named Mizuhara

episodes.title: Ex-Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Immediately after deciding not to rely on pretend dating anymore, Kazuya is hit with a triple whammy of reveals: Chizuru not only goes to his college but lives next door to him, and his grandmother is coming to visit and wants to see her.

episodes.title: Beach and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya barely has time to deal with the fallout of the situation in the pub before the gang heads off on a short trip to Izu, where they run into someone unexpected.

episodes.title: Friend and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Mami's plan comes to a head as Kazuya decides to set the story straight, to mixed reactions.

episodes.title: Hot Springs and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya and Chizuru are set up by their grandparents to visit a hot spring.

episodes.title: Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya leans his friend Kuribayashi has a girlfriend, Ruka Sarashina. But when Kuri is absent, Ruka confronts Kazuya and Chizuru about their relationship.

episodes.title: Provisional Girlfriend and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Ruka attempts to blackmail Kazuya into going out with her.

episodes.title: Christmas and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: As Winter rolls in and Christmas is on the horizon, Kazuya sees Chizuru out with another guy and decides to follow them. Is this other guy Chizuru's real boyfriend?

episodes.title: Lies and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Chizuru and Kazuya keep the lie alive in front of Kazuya's grandmother, but now there is a new guest that will get things even more complicated. And the lie becomes lies.

episodes.title: Friend's Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kuribayashi's having a very difficult time. After knowing it, Kazuya decide to do something to cheer him up. But would it be a good idea? Chizuru has a favor to ask to Kuzuya.

episodes.title: Truth and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Kazuya goes on his date with Sumi, an introverted Rent-a-Girlfriend.

episodes.title: Confession and Girlfriend
episodes.plot: Chizuru and Mami-chan go on a date.
